settings.title: About Carolina's Beaches
settings.content:
Welcome to Carolina's Beaches, your number one source everything beach related! We're dedicated to provide high quality items at a very affordable cost to our customers!  Our passion at Carolina's Beaches is to bring you products to help you live a happy beach-bum life, no matter how far you life away from the coast. We opened April, 2023 and have enjoyed growing since then.  

We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. Our goal is to offer you the best products as the absolute cheapest price. We also love sharing Christian products to encourage you with your walk with Jesus. We hope our "Be Salty" collection aids in bringing the name of Jesus to as many people in our communities as possible.

Romans 10:15 "...The Scriptures say it is a beautiful sight to see even the feet of someone coming to preach the good news."

We want you to know that our products are shipped by a third-party from a different location. We have searched the globe to find you the highest quality products, and we found them! Carolina's Beaches prides itself in selecting the best suppliers, therefore bringing you the absolute best deals!

If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us.

settings.title: Carolina's Beaches
settings.content:
The Carolinas are home to some of the most beautiful beaches in our country. Our store is dedicated to help you live the beach life to its fullest. We have all the beach necessities to make life sunny and happy. We carry beauty products, beach towels, nautical jewelry, swimwear, apparel for women and children, beach toys, home decor, and so much more! Discover our extensive collection of beach essentials designed to bring a touch of sunshine to your life. We also carry a unique collection of all things Jesus- related!

Our goal is to make your beach days truly memorable and your wallet truly thankful!

settings.gift_wrap_text: Do you want a gift wrap?

settings.title: Women Owned Business
settings.content:
Carolina's Beaches is a woman-owned business.

A McKinsey Global Institute study found that advancing women's equality could add $12 trillion to the global economy by 2025. The study shows that number could jump to $28 trillion dollars.

Support local business as much as you can; especially those owned and operated by women!

settings.title: Made in the USA
settings.content:
We strive to have products in our store that are made here in our beautiful country. We understand the importance of supporting America, boosting our economy here, and not relying on other countries to source products.

Products are labeled in the description "Made in USA".

“There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America.” – Bill Clinton

settings.title: Secure Payments
settings.content: We accept Discover, VISA, Mastercard, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and Venmo. All payment methods are secure.

settings.title: Customer Satisfaction
settings.content: Customer satisfaction guaranteed. We will strive to put you first and make your satisfaction our top priority.
